isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - TURBOCHARGER (3000 RE, V-8), REPLACE

step1.para: Chock wheels. Open side access doors.
Remove air filter assembly for access.
Remove charge air cooler pipes/hoses for access.
Disconnect exhaust pipe at turbocharger.
Remove bolt retaining transmission dipstick tube support bracket to engine.
Disconnect air line at air compressor. Disconnect air line support clamps. Reposition air line for access.
Loosen bolts retaining turbo exhaust pipes at manifold connections.
Remove bolts retaining turbo exhaust pipes base to turbo. Remove exhaust pipes base to turbo.
Remove turbocharger with turbocharger mount pedestal from engine, include oil o-ring seals.
Remove turbocharger from mount pedestal.
Clean turbocharger mating surfaces.
Install turbocharger to mounting pedestal base, include new seal.
Install turbocharger assembly to engine. Use new oil seals.
Install turbocharger exhaust pipes base mount to turbo. Use new gasket.
Tighten turbo exhaust pipes connections at exhaust manifolds.
Connect air compressor air line and air line support clamps.
Install bolt retaining transmission dipstick tube support bracket.
Connect exhaust pipe at turbocharger.
Install charge air cooler pipes/hoses.
Install air filter assembly.
Start engine and check for leaks.
Close side engine compartment doors. Remove wheel chocks.
